name: erugo
description: Erugo is a self-hosted portal for organizing links, dashboards, and widgets into a tidy personal homepage. It is geared toward homelab users who want a clean, customizable start page for services and information.
features: Link Organization: Organize services and bookmarks neatly. Tidy access point.
Dashboard Widgets: Display useful information at a glance. Customizable overview.
Clean Design: Minimalist interface focused on usability. Beautiful simplicity.
Homelab Perfect: Ideal for personal server environments. Built for enthusiasts.
Customizable Layout: Arrange your homepage exactly how you want. Total flexibility.
Self-Hosted: Your personal portal on your server. Complete control and privacy.
